channel.title: really noobish question here...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "really noobish question here..."

item.title: Re: really noobish question here...
item.content:encoded: my peacetime is +8, so I guess that is why, thanks guys for the help, really makes getting the trade bloodline a pain though…

item.title: Re: really noobish question here...
item.content:encoded: What's you're peace time? As near as I can tell, if your peace time and their peace time adds up to 4 or more, then you can't Note Page them. Otherwise they're using Tools of the Trade or a theme to make themselves immune.

item.title: Re: really noobish question here...
item.content:encoded:
You don't have time to write their name down - their Village is helping them out too much!
(Their defense bonus, which comes from their upgrades, and your and their Peacetime Bonus, is too high!)

is what it tells me, but I only attack people with no peacetime bonus…

item.title: Re: really noobish question here...
item.content:encoded: it could be your own Villages peacetime is to high

item.title: Re: really noobish question here...
item.content:encoded: It is saying you cant use your note page because they have too high peacetime?

item.title: Re: really noobish question here...
item.content:encoded: it says peacetime bonuses are too high even though the people I try to bingo have no +X for peacetime village bonus…

item.title: Re: really noobish question here...
item.content:encoded: some people have themes to make them immune to note pages, or people can use tools of the trade upgrade to protect themselves from them. also putting an eye of the storm ally in your team only makes them immune to note also.

item.title: really noobish question here...
item.content:encoded: Why will it never let me use Note Pages to Bingo people?
